details:
noun
- a footrace extending one mile
= example: a footrace extending one mile
- a unit of length equal to 1,760 yards or 5,280 feet
= synonyms: mi
- a Swedish unit of length equivalent to 10 km
= synonyms: mil
- an ancient Roman unit of length equivalent to 1620 yards
- a unit of length used in navigation
= synonyms: knot
- a former British unit of length equivalent to 6,080 feet (1,853.184 meters)
= example: a former British unit of length equivalent to 6,080 feet (1,853.184 meters)
= synonyms: mi
- a former British unit of length once used in navigation
= synonyms: sea mile
- a large distance
= example: a large distance
